column5: TODAY there was a rumour that  BOWSHEP aka KEN  caught a salmon and a rainbow while on the rivers  :clapping:  He has finally broken his 57th skunk trips streak..  Thank god  now I can relax.....  KEN post the pics and tell us the story LOL  Keep it real  Dave
I'm skeptical.  We need pictures, and not photoshopped ones  Joey
Let's all hope it wasn't foul hooked!
